summary: Drew Gonzalez is a highly skilled Backend Engineer with a strong educational background in Software Engineering and Electrical Engineering. He holds a Bachelor of Science degree from the State University of North and a Master of Science degree from the Institute of Technology of Central, both with high GPAs. With over 6 years of experience in the industry, Drew has worked as a Machine Learning Engineer at DataForge, Software Engineer at HyperWeave, and Data Engineer at BrightHub. His achievements include building a CI/CD system using Kubernetes, improving error rates by 30% and latency by 25%, and leading teams to deliver projects on time. Drew's technical skills include proficiency in programming languages such as Java, TypeScript, Go, and C++, as well as experience with web frameworks like Express, Flask, and React. He is also knowledgeable in data processing tools like PyTorch, SQL, Pandas, and TensorFlow, and has expertise in cloud and DevOps tools such as Azure, AWS, Kubernetes, and Terraform.
